questions: How to send a message to a Discord webhook using ThamesThrive?
What is the plugin used to send a message to a Discord webhook using ThamesThrive?
How to use the "Discord push" plugin to send a message to a Discord webhook using ThamesThrive?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive send a message to a Discord webhook?
Yes, ThamesThrive can send a message to a Discord webhook using the "Discord push" plugin
